title: Anacardos
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Juice bar, Colombian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Ask for the vegetarian menu, which features eggplant spread, lentil croquettes and ratatouille, Italian, Lebanese, Indian, and Chinese inspired dishes including tofu and soy meat. Fresh squeezed juices and local beer by the bottle available. Not air-conditioned but pleasant atmosphere. Previously named Torre Luna, changed owners in Mar 2014.
